content:
I'm happy to help you with meal planning and incorporating more plant-based meals into your diet!

Firstly, it's great to hear that you've been inspired by the "Vegan Recipes" account on Instagram and have been engaging with their content. Commenting on their posts is a fantastic way to stay motivated and get new ideas for healthy meals.

Now, let's get started on creating a weekly meal plan that incorporates more plant-based meals! Here are some tips to help you get started:

1. **Set your goals**: Define what you want to achieve with your meal plan. Do you want to go fully vegan, or aim for a few plant-based meals per week? Set a realistic goal that works for you.
2. **Plan around your schedule**: Consider your busy days and plan meals that can be prepared in advance or cooked quickly. You can prep meals on the weekends or one day a week to make the rest of the week easier.
3. **Shop smart**: Make a list of the ingredients you need for your meals and try to buy them in bulk. You can also explore local farmers' markets or online grocery shopping for convenient delivery.
4. **Start with familiar recipes**: Begin with recipes you've already tried or similar ones you've seen on Instagram. This will help you build confidence in the kitchen and make meal prep more enjoyable.
5. **Incorporate a variety of protein sources**: Legumes (lentils, chickpeas, black beans), tofu, tempeh, and seitan are all great protein sources. You can also experiment with nuts and seeds like almonds, chia seeds, and hemp seeds.
6. **Don't forget about meal prep**: Chop vegetables, cook grains, and prep protein sources in advance to make meal assembly easier. You can also prep individual portions for a quick grab-and-go.
7. **Get creative with leftovers**: Use leftovers to create new meals or freeze them for later. This will help reduce food waste and save time.
8. **Make it fun**: Experiment with new ingredients, flavors, and cuisines. Try cooking with different spices, herbs, and seasonings to add variety to your meals.

Here's a sample 7-day meal plan to get you started:

Monday:

* Breakfast: Avocado toast with scrambled tofu and cherry tomatoes
* Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables and chickpeas
* Dinner: Vegan lasagna (inspired by the recipe you saw on Instagram!)

Tuesday:

* Breakfast: Smoothie bowl with banana, spinach, and almond milk
* Lunch: Lentil soup with whole-grain bread
* Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli

Wednesday:

* Breakfast: Overnight oats with nuts and seeds
* Lunch: Chickpea and avocado salad wrap
* Dinner: Vegan stir-fry with tofu, mixed vegetables, and brown rice

Thursday:

* Breakfast: Whole-grain toast with almond butter and banana slices
* Lunch: Black bean and corn tacos with guacamole
* Dinner: Vegan curry with chickpeas and brown rice

Friday:

* Breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, banana, and almond milk
* Lunch: Quinoa and black bean bowl with roasted vegetables
* Dinner: Vegan pizza with roasted vegetables and whole-grain crust

Saturday:

* Breakfast: Whole-grain waffles with berries and coconut whipped cream
* Lunch: Lentil and vegetable soup with whole-grain bread
* Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted asparagus and quinoa

Sunday:

* Breakfast: Breakfast burrito with scrambled tofu, avocado, and salsa
* Lunch: Chickpea and quinoa salad with whole-grain crackers
* Dinner: Vegan chili with sweet potatoes and whole-grain cornbread

Feel free to adjust this meal plan to suit your taste preferences and dietary needs. You can also swap out ingredients or interchange different protein sources to keep things interesting.
